info.description: This is a swagger documentation for the Midaz Ledger API
info.title: Midaz Onboarding API

get.description: Get all Organizations with the input metadata or without metadata

post.description: Create an Organization with the input payload

get.description: Get an Organization with the input ID

delete.description: Delete an Organization with the input ID

patch.description: Update an Organization with the input payload

get.description: Get all Ledgers with the input metadata or without metadata

post.description: Create a Ledger with the input payload

get.description: Get a Ledger with the input ID

delete.description: Delete a Ledger with the input ID

patch.description: Update a Ledger with the input payload

get.description: Get all Accounts with the input metadata or without metadata

get.description: Get an Account with the input Alias
Get an Account with the input ID

patch.description: Update an Account with the input payload

patch.description: Update an Asset with the input payload

Account.description: Account is a struct designed to store account data.

Address.description: Address is a struct designed to store the address data of an organization.

Asset.description: Asset is a struct designed to store asset data.

CreateAccountInput.description: CreateAccountInput is the input payload to create an account.

CreateAssetInput.description: CreateAssetInput is the input payload to create an asset.

CreateLedgerInput.description: CreateLedgerInput is the input payload to create a ledger.

CreateOrganizationInput.description: CreateOrganizationInput is the input payload to create an organization.

CreatePortfolioInput.description: CreatePortfolioInput is the input payload to create a portfolio.

CreateSegmentInput.description: CreateSegmentInput is the input payload to create a segment.

Ledger.description: Ledger is a struct designed to store ledger data.

Organization.description: Organization is a struct designed to store organization data.

Pagination.description: Pagination is the struct designed to store the pagination data of an entity list.

Portfolio.description: Portfolio is a struct designed to store portfolio data.

Segment.description: Segment is a struct designed to store segment data.

Status.description: Status is the struct designed to store the status data of an entity.

UpdateAccountInput.description: UpdateAccountInput is the input payload to update an account.

UpdateAssetInput.description: UpdateAssetInput is the input payload to update an asset.

UpdateLedgerInput.description: UpdateLedgerInput is the input payload to update a ledger.

UpdateOrganizationInput.description: UpdateOrganizationInput is the input payload to update an organization.

UpdatePortfolioInput.description: UpdatePortfolioInput is the input payload to update a portfolio.

UpdateSegmentInput.description: UpdateSegmentInput is the input payload to update a segment.
